details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

The Foreign & Commonwealth Office is keen to ensure that its buildings and services are fully accessible to disabled members of the public. Wherever possible, we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. In these situations we will endeavour to provide a service or access to a building in an alternative way to ensure equality of access for disabled people.

The British High Commission in Honiara is located at the base of a steep slope on the compound of the official Residence. Access for wheelchairs users is difficult, there is an intercom at the gatehouse where the security guards will be able to alert High Commission staff if you need assistance.

If you need to visit us or use our services and feel that they may be inaccessible to you, please contact the Deputy High Commissioner on:

Telephone: +44 (677) 21705 or
Email: bhc@solomon.com.sb

Public holidays

The office will be closed on the following days in the calendar year for 2013:

  • Tuesday 1st January New Years Day

  • Friday 29th March Good Friday

  • Monday 1st April Easter Monday

  • Monday 6th May * May Bank Holiday

  • Monday 20th May Whit Monday

  • Friday 24th May * Privilege Holiday for Queens Birthday (UK)Monday 27th May * Spring bank Holiday

  • Friday 14th June Queens Birthday (SI)

  • Monday 8th July SI Independence day

  • Monday 26th August * Summer bank Holiday

  • Friday 27th September Office Away Day

  • Wednesday 25th December Christmas Day

  • Thursday 26th December Boxing Day

  • Friday 27th December* Christmas Privilege Holiday

Holidayâ€™s marked * are UK Public and Privilege Holiday
